analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0xf7863d2a6f6b83cc301e9a1f37ea72b36677d417.sol:
	Contract NICE has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0xf7863d2a6f6b83cc301e9a1f37ea72b36677d417.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/25/0xf7863d2a6f6b83cc301e9a1f37ea72b36677d417.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
